newsitem.title: GREECE: NIKIFOROS SECURITIES SUSPENDED FROM TRADE TUES.
newsitem.headline: NIKIFOROS SECURITIES SUSPENDED FROM TRADE TUES.

text.p: Athens stock exchange member Nikiforos Securities was not allowed to trade on Tuesday and was awaiting a capital markets decision later today, its managing director Fokion Skabavias told Reuters.
The firm was suspended from trade 30 minutes before Monday's close because of what it said was a misunderstanding with a bourse guarantee fund auditor, unrelated to the Delta Securities scandal.
Skabavias was expecting a capital markets decision late on Tuesday on whether it would resume trade on Wednesday. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
